description: This library contains patchs that allow digital writing and reading operation of multiple digital ports simulteously.
name: port-read-write

@/portb-write.description:
Writes the signal value to pins selected from the pin input. of PORTB registry. 
ex - 0011 0001 input write the SIG value to pins 8, 12, and 13.

HkLfJMNEm.description: Outputs a pulse when the code has finish writing to the PORTB registry
HkLfJMNEm.label: DONE

SJ5-1zEVX.description: the value that is written to the selected pins.
SJ5-1zEVX.label: SIG

r1p-1zENm.description: Signals when the code should run.
r1p-1zENm.label: UPD

rkPZ1MN4Q.description:
A binary number that represents each pin of the target hardware on PORTB.
Setting a bit to "1" selects the pin for writing.
The most significant bit is first and the least significant is last.

ex- ardunio uno most significant bit is pin 15 and the least significant is pin 8
rkPZ1MN4Q.label: PIN

@/portd-pin-read.description: This patch reads the value of the PORTD registry and outputs the bool value of the selected pin.

H1g0fB2jNm.description:
The number that represents each pin of the target hardware on PORTD.
Selects the pin state that will be read.
Pin 0-7
H1g0fB2jNm.label: PIN

HJRfrhjVQ.description: Signals when the code should run.
HJRfrhjVQ.label: UPD

HJzAMBhjNm.description: indicates when a pin input value is not accepted.
HJzAMBhjNm.label: ERR

ryb0MSni4m.description: Outputs the selected pin reg value in bool
ryb0MSni4m.label: SIG

@/portd-write.description:
Writes the signal value to pins selected from the pin input. of PORTD registry. 
ex - 0011 0001b input write the SIG value to pins 0, 4, and 5.

B1rS6CZEm.description: Outputs a pulse when the code has finish writing to the PORTD registry
B1rS6CZEm.label: DONE

By-NaCWN7.description: the value that is written to the selected pins.
By-NaCWN7.label: SIG

HJ1NTRbVX.description:
A binary number that represents each pin of the target hardware on PORTD.
Setting a bit to "1" selects the pin for writing.
The most significant bit is first and the least significant is last.

ex- ardunio uno most significant bit is pin 0 and the least significant is pin 7
HJ1NTRbVX.label: PIN

ryliH2i4Q.description: Outputs the pin 3 reg value in bool
ryliH2i4Q.label: PIN3

SJleoS2iV7.description: Outputs the pin 4 reg value in bool
SJleoS2iV7.label: PIN4

SkbeorhoNm.description: Signals when the code should run.
SkbeorhoNm.label: UPD

HJfxjBnsEX.description: Outputs the pin 0 reg value in bool
HJfxjBnsEX.label: PIN0

S1EgoH2jEX.description: Outputs the pin 5 reg value in bool
S1EgoH2jEX.label: PIN5

ryrgoBhiNX.description: Outputs the pin 2 reg value in bool
ryrgoBhiNX.label: PIN2

BJIliHnjVQ.description: Outputs the pin 6 reg value in bool
BJIliHnjVQ.label: PIN6

rkDxiS2oVX.description: Outputs the pin 1 reg value in bool
rkDxiS2oVX.label: PIN1

@/portd-read.description: This patch reads the value of the PORTD registry and outputs the bool value of pins 0-6 (this is limited due to an error. a patch cannot have more than 7 outputs)

Bk6aS2sVQ.description: Outputs pin 11 reg value in bool
Bk6aS2sVQ.label: PIN11

rygaTB2j4m.description: Outputs pin 12 reg value in bool
rygaTB2j4m.label: PIN12

Bk-a6S3jVX.description: Signals when the code should run.
Bk-a6S3jVX.label: UPD

Byfpar2jEX.description: Outputs pin 8 reg value in bool
Byfpar2jEX.label: PIN8

B1Vp6H3sEm.description: Outputs pin 13 reg value in bool
B1Vp6H3sEm.label: PIN13

rJraTBnsVm.description: Outputs pin 10 reg value in bool
rJraTBnsVm.label: PIN10

H1Pa6BnsVQ.description: Outputs pin 9 reg value in bool
H1Pa6BnsVQ.label: PIN9

@/portb-read.description:
This patch reads the value of the PORTB registry and outputs the bool value to the respective bool output
Pin 8-13

BJz7u2oNQ.description:
The number that represents each pin of the target hardware on PORTB.
Selects the pin state that will be read.
Pin 8-13
BJz7u2oNQ.label: PIN

SylfQdho4m.description: Signals when the code should run.
SylfQdho4m.label: UPD

Sy-GX_nj4m.description: indicates when a pin input value is not accepted.
Sy-GX_nj4m.label: ERR

ryEzQu2sVQ.description: Outputs the selected pin reg value in bool
ryEzQu2sVQ.label: SIG

@/portb-pin-read.description: This patch reads the value of the PORTB registry and outputs the bool value of the selected pin.

BJICOCiVm.label: SIG0
BJICOCiVm.description: The value that will be written to pin 0

rJ2vY0sEQ.label: SIG1
rJ2vY0sEQ.description: The value that will be written to pin 1

H1g2Pt0sEm.label: SIG2
H1g2Pt0sEm.description: The value that will be written to pin 2

HJTDtCjE7.label: SIG3
HJTDtCjE7.description: The value that will be written to pin 3

B1epDFRsE7.label: SIG4
B1epDFRsE7.description: The value that will be written to pin 4

B1eOYCoEm.label: SIG5
B1eOYCoEm.description: The value that will be written to pin 5

S1Z_FAjN7.label: SIG6
S1Z_FAjN7.description: The value that will be written to pin 6

H1IuKCjEm.label: SIG7
H1IuKCjEm.description: The value that will be written to pin 7

SkajKAiVm.label: PIN
SkajKAiVm.description:
A binary number that represents each pin of the target hardware on PORTB.
Setting a bit to "1" selects the pin for writing.

HyQWc0jV7.label: DONE
HyQWc0jV7.description: Signals when the write operation has finished.

S1Xz90iN7.label: UPD
S1Xz90iN7.description: Signals when the code should run.

@/portd-mass-write-bool.description:
Writes the signal value to its respective pins. The PIN input selects the PORTD registry. that will be written.
ex - 0011 0001b input write the SIG value to pins 0, 4, and 5.

HJxuZJJnVQ.label: PIN
HJxuZJJnVQ.description: A binary number that represents each pin of the target hardware on PORTD. Setting a bit to "1" selects the pin for writing.

rkz_Z1JnVm.label: DONE
rkz_Z1JnVm.description: pulses when the patch has finish writing.

BkXuZJ12N7.label: UPD
BkXuZJ12N7.description: Signals when the code should run.

By_fkk3N7.label: SIG
By_fkk3N7.description: A binary number that represents each pin's state that will be writen (1 for HIGH, 0 for LOW)of the target hardware on PORTD.

@/portd-mass-write-byte.description:
Writes the signal value to its respective pins. The PIN input selects the PORTD registry. that will be written.
ex - 0011 0001b input write the SIG value to pins 0, 4, and 5.

SyuYzbnEX.label: SIG8
SyuYzbnEX.description: The value that will be written to pin 8

B1x_FfZnNQ.label: SIG9
B1x_FfZnNQ.description: The value that will be written to pin 9

SyZdFGWhVX.label: SIG10
SyZdFGWhVX.description: The value that will be written to pin 10

HyGdFfWhVm.label: SIG11
HyGdFfWhVm.description: The value that will be written to pin 11

HJmOYfbnEX.label: SIG12
HJmOYfbnEX.description: The value that will be written to pin 12

ByVdYMbnNX.label: SIG13
ByVdYMbnNX.description: The value that will be written to pin 13

HkH_KzW3Vm.label: SIG14
HkH_KzW3Vm.description: The value that will be written to pin 14

SyLdtzb247.label: SIG15
SyLdtzb247.description: The value that will be written to pin 15

HyDuKMb34Q.label: PIN
HyDuKMb34Q.description:
A binary number that represents each pin of the target hardware on PORTB.
Setting a bit to "1" selects the pin for writing.

HJtdYG-n4Q.label: DONE
HJtdYG-n4Q.description: Signals when the write operation has finished.

Hk9OKMZ34Q.label: UPD
Hk9OKMZ34Q.description: Signals when the code should run.

@/portb-mass-write-bool.description:
Writes the signal value to its respective pins. The PIN input selects the PORTB registry. that will be written.
ex - 0011 0001b input write the SIG value to pins 8, 12, and 13.

SJVY7Wn47.label: PIN
SJVY7Wn47.description: A binary number that represents each pin of the target hardware on PORTB. Setting a bit to "1" selects the pin for writing.

Skb4KQ-2EX.label: DONE
Skb4KQ-2EX.description: pulses when the patch has finish writing.

H1GEFXbhV7.label: UPD
H1GEFXbhV7.description: Signals when the code should run.

HJXVF7Z2Vm.label: SIG
HJXVF7Z2Vm.description: A binary number that represents each pin's state that will be writen (1 for HIGH, 0 for LOW)of the target hardware on PORTB.

@/portb-mass-write-byte.description:
Writes the signal value to its respective pins. The PIN input selects the PORTB registry. that will be written.
ex - 0011 0001b input write the SIG value to pins 8, 12, and 13.
